summary: This document contains information about Fernando FUENTES Coba, a former lieutenant in the Cuban Police Force who later worked in a printing establishment in Halifax, Canada. The report includes supplemental information from the CIA records regarding FUENTES' involvement with the Departamento Tecnico de Investigaciones (DTI) and his activities related to forging birth certificates and serving as a Castro agent.
title: Fernando FUENTES Coba
recipient: STATE, DIA, ARMY, NAVY, AIR, NSA, XXX, OCR, FBI, REP, CINCLANT, CINCSO, I&NS
